name: @junctionrelay/shader-testpattern
description: TV test pattern — orientation, alignment, edges, color bars, aspect ratio circles

junctionrelay.description: Diagnostic shader for orientation and alignment verification. Corner markers (numbered 1-4), directional arrows, center crosshair, SMPTE color bars, grayscale ramp, diagonal lines, aspect ratio circles, grid overlay, and animated sweep line. Reveals flipping, mirroring, cropping, and color issues.
